DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Treating HIV-Positive Patients With HIV Vaccine ( Remune )
DOC.detailed_description: All patient begin HAART study entry ( Day 1 ) . Patients plasma HIV-1 RNA level less equal 2,000 copies/ml Week 8 randomize receive Remune Incomplete Freund 's Adjuvant ( IFA ) Week 9 . Patients achieve plasma HIV-1 RNA level less equal 2,000 copies/ml Week 8 randomize terminate study . These patient eligible receive funding 3-month supply nelfinavir ( Viracept ) Combivir . Randomized patient receive Remune IFA Week 9 approximately every 12 week thereafter study completion ( last patient reach Week 48 ) . Patients consider virologic failure ( 1 ) fail achieve virologic response Week 48 ( 2 ) achieve virologic response , virologic relapse . Regardless previous response status , patient whose plasma HIV-1 RNA level increase great 2,000 copies/ml receive protocol-specified HAART eligible receive salvage therapy continue receive Remune IFA study completion . Study visit occur screen , Day 1 , Weeks 4 , 8 , 9 , 12 , every 4 week thereafter last patient reach Week 48 . Patients complete study eligible participate rollover study .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients may eligible study : Are HIVpositive . Are least 13 year old ( consent parent guardian require 18 ) . Have viral load least 10,000 copies/ml . Have CD4 count least 250 cells/mm3 . Have never take antiHIV drug .
